text: The number six is a natural number that comes after the number five and before the number seven. Six is also the first perfect number which means that the sum of its factors (1, 2 and 3) are equal to the number itself (6). The next perfect number is 28. In Roman numerals, it is VI. The number six is an even number. The number 6 (six) is half a dozen. Category:Integers
title: 6 (number)
